title: Notable & Quotable: Authoritarianism
sub_head: ‘Climate change poses an even graver threat to public safety. Consequently, I argue, legitimacy may require a similarly authoritarian approach.’
body: The abstract of “Political Legitimacy, Authoritarianism, and Climate Change,” a paper by Prof. Ross Mittiga of Chile’s Institute of Political Science published by the American Political Science Review, Dec. 6, 2021:
